definitions.definition: A covered pouch , usually one of a pair , laid across the back of a horse , donkey, or mule behind its saddle , or hanging over the rear wheel of a motorcycle ; often made of leather or (on a motorcycle) a rigid material.
A seat pack or a seat bag ( a pouch or a small bag attached to the seat or seat post of a bicycle )
Loose fatty flesh on a person's upper thighs or buttocks, that hangs like saddlebags.
A style of house with two rooms separated by a small hall and open space.

main_definition: A covered pouch , usually one of a pair , laid across the back of a horse , donkey, or mule behind its saddle , or hanging over the rear wheel of a motorcycle ; often made of leather or (on a motorcycle) a rigid material.
secondary_definitions: ( cycling ) A seat pack or a seat bag ( a pouch or a small bag attached to the seat or seat post of a bicycle )
( in the plural , US , informal ) Loose fatty flesh on a person's upper thighs or buttocks, that hangs like saddlebags.
( architecture ) A style of house with two rooms separated by a small hall and open space.
